```js
FrameLayout  

    android:id="@+id/container" 
    android:layout_width="match_parent" 
    android:layout_height="match_parent" 
    tools:context=".MainActivity"> 
    tools:ignore="MergeRootFrame"> 

    <WebView 
        android:id="@+id/activity_main_webview" 
        android:layout_width="match_parent" 
        android:layout_height="match_parent" /> 
</FrameLayout> 

```
